item.title: Light Gray Dye Ints
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

Okay so I wanted to make a sorta mini quest and thought it’d be cool if I used grayish dye in it but there isn’t any gray dye in the 317 client so I tryed recoloring through the ints but I came out with this which the color’s right i guess but the inv model isn’t any help? heres the ints

if(i == 8763){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 960; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0x007f; class8.anInt174 = 2705; class8.anInt181 = 760; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = -2; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Gray Dye"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Some gray dye.".getBytes(); }

Read full topic
